article.title: Raytheon To Supply Tomahawk Launching System Capsules Under Navy Agreement
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Raytheon Company has received a $2.3 million modification to a previous firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of 53 fiscal 2010 Tomahawk composite capsule launching system capsules. Under the contract, awarded by the Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, work will be performed at more than 11 different locations in the United States with an expected completion date of February 2012.
